Package interfaces

Interface InternshipFilterService

All Known Implementing Classes:
InternshipFilterServiceImpl
public interface InternshipFilterService
Service interface for filtering internship opportunities and retrieving available filter options. Provides methods to filter internships based on criteria and to get distinct values for filter dropdowns.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<InternshipOpportunity>
    filterInternships(List<InternshipOpportunity> internships, InternshipFilter filter)
    Filters a list of internship opportunities based on the specified filter criteria.
    List<String>
    getAvailableCompanies(List<InternshipOpportunity> internships)
    Retrieves all distinct company names available in the internship opportunities.
    List<String>
    getAvailableLevels(List<InternshipOpportunity> internships)
    Retrieves all distinct academic levels available in the internship opportunities.
    List<String>
    getAvailablePreferredMajors(List<InternshipOpportunity> internships)
    Retrieves all distinct preferred majors available in the internship opportunities.
    List<String>
    getAvailableStatuses(List<InternshipOpportunity> internships)
    Retrieves all distinct statuses available in the internship opportunities.

  • Method Details

    • filterInternships

      List<InternshipOpportunity> filterInternships(List<InternshipOpportunity> internships, InternshipFilter filter)
      Filters a list of internship opportunities based on the specified filter criteria.
      Parameters:
      internships - the list of internship opportunities to filter
      filter - the filter criteria to apply
      Returns:
      a filtered list of internship opportunities that match the criteria

    • getAvailableLevels

      List<String> getAvailableLevels(List<InternshipOpportunity> internships)
      Retrieves all distinct academic levels available in the internship opportunities.
      Parameters:
      internships - the list of internship opportunities to analyze
      Returns:
      a list of unique academic levels

    • getAvailableCompanies

      List<String> getAvailableCompanies(List<InternshipOpportunity> internships)
      Retrieves all distinct company names available in the internship opportunities.
      Parameters:
      internships - the list of internship opportunities to analyze
      Returns:
      a list of unique company names

      Retrieves all distinct statuses available in the internship opportunities.
      Parameters:
      internships - the list of internship opportunities to analyze
      Returns:
      a list of unique status values
